td.content: s:patient presents with moderate parethesia in lower limbs, severe weight loss and moderate lethargy for 4 weeks. she has a history of Type 1 Diabetes for past 3 years. she is a white f student aged 24 yrs. she denies drinking alcohol she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 61 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to endocrinology.
